When a creature enters the snare's square, the trap releases, dealing [[/r 12d6[piercing]]] damage in a deafening explosion. Everyone in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10]{10â€‘foot radius} of the snare's square must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:31] save.

Critical Success The creature in unaffected,

Success The creature takes half damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Deafened]{Deafened} for 1 round.

Failure The creature takes full damage, [[/r {2d6}[persistent, piercing]]]{2d6 persistent piercing damage}@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent Piercing Damage}, and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Deafened]{Deafened} for 1 minute.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage, [[/r {4d6}[persistent, piercing]]]{4d6 persistent piercing damage}@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent Piercing Damage}, and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Deafened]{Deafened} for 1 minute.
